title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\SecurityPolicyRuleMatcher
name: SecurityPolicyRuleMatcher
description:
Represents a match condition that incoming traffic is evaluated against. Exactly one field must be specified.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.SecurityPolicyRuleMatcher

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.config
params.description: The configuration options available when specifying versioned_expr. This field must be specified if versioned_expr is specified and cannot be specified if versioned_expr is not specified.

params.name: data.expr
params.description: User defined CEVAL expression. A CEVAL expression is used to specify match criteria such as origin.ip, source.region_code and contents in the request header.

params.name: data.versioned_expr
params.description: Preconfigured versioned expression. If this field is specified, config must also be specified. Available preconfigured expressions along with their requirements are: SRC_IPS_V1 - must specify the corresponding src_ip_range field in config. Check the VersionedExpr enum for the list of possible values.
